1069:4: iha kaṃcit kāla viśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati,
1069:7: vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām - ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ,
1069:10: syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām |
1069:14: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai |
1069:15: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai ||1||
1069:21: tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti,
1069:23: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā |
1069:24: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā ||2||
1069:25: saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati?
1069:38: evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha -
1069:40: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate ||3||
1069:41: yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt,
1069:43: na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti |
1069:44: tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam ||3||
1069:45: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
1069:46: evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha -
1069:47: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā
1069:48: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate ||4||
1069:49: naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate |
1069:50: yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate,
1069:51: kiṃ tarhi sarvadaiva vidyate | uktaṃ hi -
1069:53: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā || iti |
1069:55: tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi?
1069:56: ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti |
1069:65: yadapi nirdiṣṭam- bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā bhāvādutpāda ucyate,
1069:70: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye |
1069:71: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ ||iti |
1069:80: api ca | kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt?
1069:86: yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati,
1069:88: tathā saṃskāraskandhasaṃgrahapratītyasamutpādāṅga saṃgrahādikamapi sarvaṃ virodhayatīti na yuktametanmatam |
1069:95: idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
1069:98: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate ||5||
1069:99: yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt,
1069:103: atha syāt - yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
1069:112: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate ||6||
1069:113: sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt |
1069:119: anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti |
1069:122: kiṃ cānyat - ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātā makṣayadharmiṇo vā?
1069:125: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca ||7||
1069:126: tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ |
1069:127: akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ |
1069:134: yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo bhāvasya saṃbhavataḥ,
1069:146: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate |
1069:148: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate ||8||
1069:150: tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti pratiṣiddhau |
1069:152: tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati?
1069:153: bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau ||
1069:154: apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate |
1069:165: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate |
1069:168: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate ||
1069:170: kiṃ cānyat - ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpamānau śūnyasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātā - maśūnyasya vā?
1069:176: kiṃ cānyat - iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
1069:177: tau ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā/ ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha -
1069:187: āgopālāṅganādiko hi janaḥ yasmāt saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca paśyati,
1069:189: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ śakyo draṣṭumiti | evamapi -
1069:192: na hi yad yad lokenopalabhyate tasya tasya astitvam |
1069:193: tathā hi āgopālāṅganādiko jano gandharvanagaramāyāsvapnālātacakramarīcikāsalilādikamavidyamāna mapi paśyati indriyopaghātāt,
1069:196: atha kasmāt punaretadevaṃ niścīyate - avidyamānasvarūpāvimau saṃbhavavibhavau mohādeva vāralokena dṛśyete iti |
1069:199: iha yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma bhavet,
1069:206: bhāvāt tāvat saṃbhavākhyād bhāvasya saṃbhavākhyasya utpādo na vidyate,
1069:214: yadi syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt |
1069:232: athavā | ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ - iha hi yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
1069:234: tau ca bhāvābhāvau sarvathā vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ |
1069:243: api ca | yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma syāt,
1069:245: na ca kaścid bhāvaḥ svarūpato'sti kharaviṣāṇavat svabhāvānutpannatvāt |
1069:248: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate |
1069:251: etacca ādya eva prakaraṇe vyākhyātattvānna punarvyākhyāyate |
1069:252: yaścaivaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa jāyate sa idānīṃ kuto jāyate?
1069:254: avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam - sarvathā nāsti bhāvasyotpāda iti ||13||
1069:255: bhāvasadbhāvatābhyupagame ca bhavataḥ śāśvatocchedadarśanamāpadyate bauddhamatānugasyetyāha - bhāvamabhyupapannasya śāśvatocchedadarśanam |
1069:258: sa bhāvo hi nityo'nityo'tha vā bhavet ||14||
1069:262: yasmāt sa bhāvaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nityo vā bhavedanityo vā |
1069:281: sa eva saṃsāraḥ yo'yaṃ hetuphalāvicchinnakramavartī utpādavyayānuprabandhaḥ saṃskārāṇāmiti |
1069:287: yo hi hetukṣaṇaḥ phalasyotpattau hetubhāvamupetya nirudhyate ,
1069:289: tavāyaṃ kathaṃ na doṣa iti cet,
1069:294: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
1069:296: ityuktam, tatrāpi amunā nyāyena naiḥsvābhāvyameva bhāvānāṃ pratipāditam |
1069:297: anyathā hi sati bhāvasvarūpe bījāṅkurayoḥ kathamanyatvaṃ na syāt?
1069:299: evaṃ tāvad bhāvamabhyupapannasya hetoḥ punaranutpādāducchedadarśanaprasaṅgamudbhāvya idānīṃ śāśvatavāde doṣaprasaṅgamudbhāvayannāha -
1069:301: yadi hi hetoḥ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt,
1069:302: tasya paścādasadbhāvo na syāt svabhāvasyā napāyitvāt |
1069:321: anayośca bhavayoḥ saṃsāra iti saṃjñā kṛtā ||17||
1069:322: atra ca idaṃ vicāryate - ya eṣa prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavasthāpyate,
1069:323: sa kiṃ carame bhave niruddhe upajāyate,
1069:327: sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavatīti pratipādayannāha -
1069:328: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ |
1069:329: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ ||18||
1069:330: tatra yadi carame bhave niruddhe prathamo bhavo jāyate iti parikalpyate,
1069:334: tasmāccarame niruddhe prathamo bhavo na yujyate ||
1069:335: idānīmaniruddhe'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo na yujyate |
1069:342: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ |
1069:344: idānīṃ nirudhyamāne'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha -
1069:354: jāyamānaścāpara iti yaugapadyenaiva dvau bhavau prāpnutaḥ |
1069:355: na caikasya yugapad dvau bhavau saṃbhavataḥ ityuktametat ||19||
1069:358: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate ||20||
1069:361: yadā evaṃ yathoditanyāyena niruddhe carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
1069:362: aniruddhe'pi carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
1069:363: sārdhaṃ caikasmiśca kāle caramena bhavena saha prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
1069:364: tat kimidānīṃ yeṣu eva skandheṣu mriyate teṣu eva jāyate iti syāt |
1069:367: na hi mriyamāṇo jāyate iti dṛṣṭam ||20||
1069:372: carame bhave niruddhe'niruddhe nirudhyamāne yasmāt prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
1069:374: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ ||21||
1069:375: yā ca idānīṃ triṣu kāleṣu nāsti,
1069:376: kutaḥ sā anyenātmanā bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā nāsti bhavanmatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ |
1069:380: tataśca bhāvābhyupagame sati sa eva śāśvatocchedavādaprasaṅgo durnivāro bhavatām,
1069:381: ityato nāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvata utpattiriti siddham |
1069:385: na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro |
1069:386: na ca anyu tato na caiva ta -
1069:390: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato
1069:396: jāyate cyavate cāpi na ca jātirna ca cyutiḥ |
1069:412: so'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ |
